Name: Percentage of cases where 'Payment Handled' occurs after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in variants that include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' at any point
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' executions out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events that follow a path containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' → 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' → 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants ending with 'Payment Handled' that never included 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in successful reimbursement cases (i.e., variants that reach 'Payment Handled' without any rejection)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' occurrences preceded by 'Request Payment' within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Ratio of 'Payment Handled' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that eventually still reach 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in variants that include pre-approver involvement (i.e., contain 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' or 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all completed reimbursements ('Payment Handled') that originated from declarations initially rejected by any actor, including 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' executions that occur in the minimal variant: 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' → 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' → 'Request Payment' → 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in variants that bypass pre-approver entirely versus those that involve pre-approver (approved or rejected)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of total activity executions represented by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Payment Handled' is performed per unique declaration (case), ensuring it occurs only once per case
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that ultimately result in 'Payment Handled' compared to variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' events that are part of reimbursement cycles involving more than one submission due to prior rejections, including those triggered by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events grouped by year (2017 vs 2018) to assess temporal trends in reimbursement completion
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Ratio of 'Payment Handled' occurrences in 2018 (university-wide data) versus 2017 (two departments only)
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities
